Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[S] You mouth becomes inexplicably dry.
X[S] \$(person) appears to have dilated pupils.

(\{ "StoryHost Roo, Wed Sep 4 21:57:14 2019", "StoryHost Roo, Wed Sep 4 22:01:55 2019", "StoryHostess Topsy, Wed Sep 4 22:02:07 2019", "StoryHost Roo, Sun Sep 8 16:09:56 2019", "StoryPuppet Kata, Sun Sep 8 16:12:26 2019", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 11:40:19 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 13:24:19 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 23 16:56:31 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Thu Apr 23 17:31:17 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Thu Apr 30 17:26:49 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Mon May 4 22:27:43 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Fri May 8 17:10:56 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Fri May 8 18:40:51 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Fri May 8 19:02:10 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Wed May 20 15:10:46 2020", "Diego, Tue Jun 2 23:04:33 2020", "StoryCoder Roo, Sat Jun 6 10:06:33 2020", "Aldur, Sat Jun 6 14:13:55 2020", "Regina, Sat Jun 6 16:23:14 2020", "Isabelle, Thu Jun 18 20:27:48 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Tue Jul 14 09:22:28 2020", "StoryHost Roo, Wed Jul 22 21:24:34 2020", "StoryBuilder Kjell, Wed Jul 22 21:35:55 2020", "Archduke Alonzo, Mon Aug 3 21:42:37 2020", "Lord Trevyn, Sun Aug 9 13:58:53 2020", "Leliana, Wed Aug 26 14:17:40 2020", "Locklan, Wed Mar 3 18:36:01 2021", "Steve, Wed Jun 23 16:06:47 2021", "Santiago, Thu Dec 15 17:21:07 2022", "StoryHostess Topsy, Tue Aug 29 22:13:11 2023", "Archduke Alonzo, Tue Aug 29 23:34:26 2023" \})

X[S] \{ Paralysis, breathlessness, and intense pain bring the terror to a fever pitch. \| With a sharp and intensely painful tensing, your body succumbs to another fit of violent convulsions. \| Without warning, a violent seizure tears through your body. \| Paralysis makes it nearly impossible to breathe as you succumb to vivid hallucinations and delirium. \| Unable to fight against it, another wave of intense and painful convulsions takes over your body. \}

X[S] \{ Anxiety rises as your pulse quickens. \| Despite your efforts, your words come out slurred. \| A dry sensation in your mouth and throat makes it difficult to talk. \| A wave of vertigo strikes out of nowhere. \| The sensation of dizziness sweeps through your body before settling once more. \}

X[S] \{ Losing your balance, you sway in place. \| A rapid and intense rolling sensation throws you off balance. \| You find it hard to talk as another wave dizziness tears through your body. \| The pit of your stomach feels like it drops as you struggle to catch your breath and your pulse quickens. \| Intense confusion and increasing anxiety make it difficult to talk. \}

X[S] \{ Flashing lights and distorted images cloud your mind as hallucinations make it impossible to decipher reality and imagination. \| Unable to move, your chest tightens and it becomes harder to breathe. \| Without warning, violent convulsions tear through your body. \| With a groan, your back arches and a violent seizure rips through your body. \| After an unsuccessful attempt to catch your breath, vivid hallucinations white out your vision and fill you with abject terror. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{stops breathing for a moment as a seizure overtakes their body. \| grimaces in pain as their eyes roll back and a series of violent convulsions wracks their body. \| appears weakened and unable to breathe properly, their eyes full of panic. \| gasps for air and struggles to speak around the rigor of paralysis. \| is unable to move, but continues to gasp for shallow breaths with a look of terror on their face. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows pale for a moment. \|struggles to articulate themselves. \|shivers while growing pale in the face, pupils dilated more than usual. \|makes a facial expression of confusion, swaying subtly in place. \|appears to be suffering from intense dizziness. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{grows deathly pale and struggles to speak. \| shivers and pauses with a look of fear on their face before coughing dryly. \| pauses and seems to struggle with vertigo. \| gasps softly while making a pained, frightened facial expression. \| struggles with a pained look of discomfort and confusion upon their face. \}

X[S] \$(person) \{ begins to violently convulse. \|gasps and goes rigid, mumbling inarticulate, panicked words. \| struggles to breathe before succumbing to violent, full body seizure. \| groans and seizes, their chest straining and eyes flicking everywhere in panic. \| appears to struggle with an unseen force, gurgling in an attempt to shout. \}
